body.name: Lavish Home (Black Standing Rolling Laptop Desk with Casters for Mobility-Portable Workstation for Home, Office, or Classroom

FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 9 hrs 46 mins
features: MOBILE DESK - This rolling desk maximizes usable work and storage space in a compact and portable package. The computer cart showcases a spacious desktop table with enough room for a laptop, so you can take your work with you from room to room.

STORAGE SHELF - The portable computer desk is equipped with a lower shelf and riser for storing books or supplies. Use the lower shelf on the desk to keep a keyboard, mouse, pen, phone, and papers close at hand.

SMOOTH MOBILITY - Taking your office desk from place to place has never been so easy with the sturdy base on the laptop table and four durable casters providing smooth, wobble-free motion both on hard and carpeted floors.

SPACE EFFICIENT - This portable desk features a space-saving design that makes it perfect for use in dorm rooms, apartments, and even classrooms. The laptop cart also helps promote better posture to reduce back and neck pain.
PRODUCT DETAILS - Materials: Steel and Wood. Dimensions: (L) 23.5” x (W) 17” x (H) 29”. Color: Black.
body.description: Experience the health benefits of standing and the freedom to work anywhere with the Stand-Up Desk by Lavish Home. This rolling cart features a space-saving design that makes it perfect for use in dorm rooms, apartments, and even classrooms. The work desk for home office features a second shelf for a keyboard, books, or office supplies, and has four caster wheels for easy mobility. IMPORTANT: Lavish Home is committed to providing the consumer with the absolute best price and value on all of our products. NOTE: This is an exclusive product of Lavish Home and ONLY Home Office Desks by Lavish Home are GUARANTEED to be genuine. Avoid buying counterfeit products and transacting with unauthorized sellers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect little desk
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Easy to install and the modern design goes well with any interior design

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Light duty at a good price.
reviews.reviewText: Not very sturdy. I put a shelf on the bottom to set the desktop on and that improved it some.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This could be redesigned to make it a 5 star product.
reviews.reviewText: The keyboard shelf needs to be larger and stick out a bit more forward. As it stands, it is so deficient in that respect that it costs this review 2 stars.Assembly is pretty quick and easy and it goes together pretty solidly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Organization is the key
reviews.reviewText: I love this. Just one word of warning, although the printer does fit on the bottom, it is a little inconvenient and not very sturdy. If you will be moving it around a lot be sure your electronics are wireless! Mine is not and my extention cord is not very long either, which means I will be purchasing a longer power surge!!!! I love the sleek look and it meets most of my needs. I would definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works for what I need.
reviews.reviewText: Size nice and small. But not as sturdy as wanted, but size could be why too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong anger rolls easily.
reviews.reviewText: This is a great mobile desk.I do a lot of projects with Raspberry pi and needed a place that I could leave everything and come back to it when I wanted to.This desk is perfect for the job.Very sturdy and easy to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works for me!
reviews.reviewText: Clearly my build / utilization is testing its structural integrity by adding the surface mount 4U rack, the power strip, etc., but its mobility has been handy.Value to cost is on point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good value; space saver
reviews.reviewText: The cart was very easy to put together and was exactly as described on the product description. I wouldn't suggest using with an actual computer keyboard as it is not very comfortable to type. The bottom tray is fixed and a tight size for a keyboard. I use it for to hold my mouse and I have small hands and I have to position it pretty carefully to be able to use it. I mostly use it to hold my cell phone while charging. Table is very portable and can hold a laptop quite easily. Wheels lock when you don't want the table to move around. Good value for the price.
